content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'OES Data Source') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [OES Data Source] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://raysynapsemgdvnetdlacctfs@raysynapsemgdvnetdlacct.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.testmulticsv (
	[Calendar_Year] nvarchar(4000),
	[Quarter] nvarchar(4000),
	[Excise_Tax] nvarchar(4000),
	[Cultivation_Tax] nvarchar(4000),
	[Sales_Tax] nvarchar(4000),
	[Total_Tax] nvarchar(4000),
	[Year_Quarter] nvarchar(4000),
	[Taxable_Sales] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'DCC/TestCSV*.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [OES Data Source],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.testmulticsv order by 3
GO
